ðŸ“– Summary: The fingerprint-suite repository provides tools for generating and injecting browser fingerprints to anonymize web scrapers. It includes modules for generating realistic HTTP headers and browser fingerprints, injecting these fingerprints into Playwright or Puppeteer instances, and a Bayesian network implementation for fingerprint generation.
